title: Best of The Program | Guests: Stu & Cathy Scheller & Herschel Walker | 9/30/21
description:
Pat Gray joins to discuss the rising inflation under the Biden administration. The parents of Lt. Col. Stuart Scheller, Stu and Cathy Scheller, join Glenn to discuss their son's imprisonment for demanding accountability for the Afghanistan withdrawal. Congressional candidate Herschel Walker joins Glenn to discuss his run for U.S. Senate in Georgia and how he plans to unite the state and the country.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
